meanings.definition: A person or company that transports goods or materials.
meanings.sent1: The haulers delivered the packages to our doorstep.
meanings.sent2: The haulers loaded the truck with boxes for shipping.
meanings.sent3: The haulers joked about racing each other to make the deliveries.
meanings.sent4: The haulers were like busy bees buzzing around the warehouse.
meanings.sent5: The haulers carefully carried fragile items to avoid any damage.

meanings.definition: A vehicle or machine used for transporting heavy items.
meanings.sent1: The construction site used powerful haulers to move large rocks.
meanings.sent2: The haulers at the mine transported ore from the depths.
meanings.sent3: The haulers beeped their horns in a friendly melody.
meanings.sent4: The haulers roared to life, ready to tackle the heavy load.
meanings.sent5: The haulers rumbled down the road, shaking the ground beneath them.

meanings.definition: The act of transporting or carrying items.
meanings.sent1: The haulers of the team efficiently moved the equipment to the venue.
meanings.sent2: The haulers of the ship unloaded the cargo at the port.
meanings.sent3: The haulers danced around each other, coordinating their movements.
meanings.sent4: The haulers of time never stop, always carrying us forward.
meanings.sent5: The haulers of the forest busily relocated seeds for planting.
